nodes.text: Docking bay 1138 was a private, walled docking bay that was located in the city Taggon on the planet Druckenwell. During the time of the Clone Wars, the Heroes of Cularin traveled to Druckenwell and landed their starship in docking bay 1138, planning to deliver some cargo to House D'Vails. However, a group of Red Fury Brotherhood pirates led by the Human Lan Crish entered the bay and asked the heroes to turn the cargo over to them.
